recipes.label: Study the Blueprint
recipes.startdescription: With enough time and patience this could be solved...
recipes.description: None of this should make sense! This should not be possible!

recipes.label: BLUEPRINT1 + DREAM
recipes.description: You fall asleep pouring over the designs and dream of your heartbeat replaced with loud ticking. It calms you.

recipes.label: BLUEPRINT2 + DREAM
recipes.description: You fall asleep pouring over the designs and dream you are walking down the copper pathways and circuits.

recipes.label: BLUEPRINT2 + EXPLORE
recipes.startdescription: Perhaps if you followed the circuits on a map?
recipes.description: You travel up and down each street, following the layout of the circuitry. You understand now. This is not a design for a new human. It is a design for an upgrade.
